63 template <class D, size_t N>
64 class Vector {
65 public:
69 
70  static Vector<D, N> EmptyVector() {
71  return Vector<D, N>(false);
72  }
73 
74  static const Vector<D, N>& Ones() {
75  static Vector<D, N> ones(D(1.0));
76  return ones;
77  }
78 
79  static const Vector<D, N>& Right() {
80  static_assert(N >= 3, "Incorrect size");
81  static Vector<D, N> right(D(1.0), D(0.0), D(0.0));
82  return right;
83  }
84  static const Vector<D, N>& Left() {
85  static_assert(N >= 3, "Incorrect size");
86  static Vector<D, N> left(D(-1.0), D(0.0), D(0.0));
87  return left;
88  }
89  static const Vector<D, N>& Up() {
90  static_assert(N >= 3, "Incorrect size");
91  static Vector<D, N> up(D(0.0), D(1.0), D(0.0));
92  return up;
93  }
94  static const Vector<D, N>& Down() {
95  static_assert(N >= 3, "Incorrect size");
96  static Vector<D, N> down(D(0.0), D(-1.0), D(0.0));
97  return down;
98  }
99  static const Vector<D, N>& Forward(){
100  static_assert(N >= 3, "Incorrect size");
101  static Vector<D, N> forward(D(0.0), D(0.0), D(1.0));
102  return forward;
103  }
104  static const Vector<D, N>& Back() {
105  static_assert(N >= 3, "Incorrect size");
106  static Vector<D, N> back(D(0.0), D(0.0), D(-1.0));
107  return back;
108  }
109  static Vector<D, N>* EmptyVectorPointer() {
110  return new Vector<D, N>(false);
111  }
112 
114 
118  explicit Vector(D fillValue = D(0)) {
119  // Zero vector by default
120  std::fill(std::begin(m_array), std::end(m_array), fillValue);
121  }
122 
123  Vector(const QJsonValue& json) {
124  loadFromJson(json);
125  }
126 
127  Vector(const std::vector<D>& vec) {
128  initialize(vec);
129  }
130 
131  Vector(const QVector3D& vector, D wpos) {
132  initialize(vector.x(), vector.y(), vector.z(), wpos);
133  }
134  Vector(const QVector3D& vector) {
135  initialize(vector.x(), vector.y(), vector.z());
136  }
137  Vector(const QVector2D& vector, D zpos, D wpos){
138  initialize(vector.x(), vector.y(), zpos, wpos);
139  }
140  Vector(const QVector2D& vector)
141  {
142  initialize(vector.x(), vector.y());
143  }
144  Vector(D xpos, D ypos, D zpos = D(0), D wpos = D(0))
145  {
146  initialize(xpos, ypos, zpos, wpos);
147  }
148  Vector(const D* arrayPtr)
149  {
150  memcpy(m_array.data(), arrayPtr, sizeof(D)*N);
151  }
152 
153  // TODO: Enforce type D in entries argument
154  template <size_t M, typename... T>
155  Vector(const Vector<D, M>& vec, T&&... entries)
156  {
157  //constexpr size_t numArgs = entries.size();
158  std::vector<D> entryVec{ { static_cast<D>(entries)... } };
159  size_t numArgs = entryVec.size();
160  constexpr size_t size = std::min(N, M);
161 
162  // Populate from other vector
163  memcpy(m_array.data(), vec.m_array.data(), sizeof(D)*size);
164 
165  // Populate from packed arguments
166  if (numArgs && M < N) {
167  constexpr int diff = std::max(int(N) - int(M), 0);
168  //memcpy(m_array.data() + M, entryVec.data(), sizeof(D)*numArgs);
169  memcpy(m_array.data() + M, entryVec.data(), sizeof(D)*diff);
170  }
171 
172  if (M + numArgs < N) {
173  // Fill remaining entries with zero
174  std::fill(std::begin(m_array) + M + numArgs, std::end(m_array), D(0));
175  }
176  }
177 
178  template <size_t M, typename ... Entries>
179  Vector(D fillValue, const Vector<D, M>& vec, Entries... entries)
180  {
181  std::vector<D> entryVec{ { static_cast<D>(entries)... } };
182  uint numArgs = entryVec.size();
183  size_t size = std::min(N, M);
184  memcpy(m_array.data(), vec.m_array.data(), sizeof(D)*size);
185 
186  // Populate from packed arguments
187  memcpy(m_array.data() + M, entryVec.data(), sizeof(D)*numArgs);
188 
189  if (M + numArgs < N) {
190  // Fill remaining entries with zero
191  std::fill(std::begin(m_array) + M + numArgs, std::end(m_array), fillValue);
192  }
193  }
194 
198  template <typename T>
199  explicit Vector(const Vector<T, N>& vec)
200  {
201  for (size_t i = 0; i < N; i++) {
202  m_array[i] = D(vec[i]);
203  }
204  }
205 
206  ~Vector() {
207  }
209 
213  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
214  inline bool operator< (const Vector<D, N>& other) const {
215  return lengthSquared() < other.lengthSquared();
216  }
217  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
218  inline D& operator[] (std::size_t i) {
219 
220  return m_array[i];
221  }
222  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
223  inline const D& operator[] (std::size_t i) const{
224  return m_array[i];
225  }
226  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
227  inline Vector<D, N>& operator+= (const Vector<D, N> &rhs) {
228 #ifdef LINALG_USE_EIGEN
229  auto thisMap = map();
230  thisMap += rhs.getMap();
231 #else
232  std::vector<D> result;
233  result.reserve(size());
234 
235  std::transform(m_array.begin(), m_array.end(), rhs.begin(), std::back_inserter(result), std::plus<D>());
236 
237  //m_array = std::move(result.data());
238  std::move(result.begin(), result.begin() + result.size(), m_array.begin());
239 #endif
240  return *this;
241  }
242 
243  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
244  inline Vector<D, N>& operator+= (D factor) {
245 #ifdef LINALG_USE_EIGEN
246  auto thisMap = map();
247  thisMap += factor;
248 #else
249  for (size_t i = 0; i < N; i++) {
250  m_array[i] += D;
251  }
252 #endif
253  return *this;
254  }
255 
256  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
257  inline const Vector<D, N> operator+ (const Vector<D, N> &other) const {
258  Vector<D, N> result = *this;
259  result += other;
260  return result;
261  }
262 
263  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
264  inline const Vector<D, N> operator+ (D other) const {
265 #ifdef LINALG_USE_EIGEN
266  auto thisMap = getMap();
267  Eigen::Array<D, N, 1> outMap = thisMap + other;
268  Vector<D, N> result(outMap.data());
269 #else
270  Vector<D, N> result = *this;
271  for (size_t i=0; i < m_array.size(); i++) {
272  result.m_array[i] += other;
273  }
274 #endif
275  return result;
276 
277  }
278 
279  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
280  inline Vector<D, N>& operator-= (const Vector<D, N> &rhs) {
281 //#ifdef LINALG_USE_EIGEN
282 // auto thisMap = map();
283 // thisMap -= rhs.getMap();
284 //#else
285  //std::vector<D> result;
286  //result.reserve(size());
287 
288  std::transform(m_array.begin(), m_array.end(), rhs.begin(), m_array.begin(), std::minus<D>());
289 
290  //std::move(result.begin(), result.begin() + result.size(), m_array.begin());
291 //#endif
292  return *this;
293  }
294 
295  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
296  inline Vector<D, N>& operator-= (D factor) {
297 #ifdef LINALG_USE_EIGEN
298  auto thisMap = map();
299  thisMap -= factor;
300 #else
301  for (size_t i = 0; i < N; i++) {
302  m_array[i] -= D;
303  }
304 #endif
305  return *this;
306  }
307 
308  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
309  inline const Vector<D, N> operator- (const Vector<D, N> &other) const {
310  Vector<D, N> result = *this;
311  result -= other;
312  return result;
313  }
314 
315  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
316  inline const Vector<D, N> operator-() const {
317  Vector<D, N> result = *this * -1;
318  return result;
319  }
320 
321  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
322  inline const Vector<D, N> operator-(D other) const {
323  Vector<D, N> result = *this;
324  result -= other;
325  return result;
326  }
327 
328  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
329  inline Vector<D, N>& operator*= (const Vector<D, N> &rhs) {
330 #ifdef LINALG_USE_EIGEN
331  auto thisMap = map();
332  thisMap *= rhs.getMap();
333 #else
334  std::vector<D> result;
335  result.reserve(size());
336 
337  std::transform(m_array.begin(), m_array.end(), rhs.begin(), std::back_inserter(result), std::multiplies<D>());
338 
339  //m_array = std::move(result.data());
340  std::move(result.begin(), result.begin() + result.size(), m_array.begin());
341 
342 #endif
343  return *this;
344  }
345 
346  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
347  inline Vector<D, N>& operator*= (D scale) {
348 #ifdef LINALG_USE_EIGEN
349  auto thisMap = map();
350  thisMap *= scale;
351 #else
352  std::vector<D> result;
353  result.reserve(size());
354 
355  std::transform(m_array.begin(), m_array.end(), std::back_inserter(result),
356  [&](D& entry) {return entry * scale; }
357  );
358 
359  //m_array = std::move(result.data());
360  std::move(result.begin(), result.begin() + result.size(), begin());
361 
362 #endif
363  return *this;
364  }
365 
366  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
367  inline const Vector<D, N> operator* (const Vector<D, N> &other) const {
368  Vector<D, N> result = *this;
369  result *= other;
370  return result;
371  }
372 
373  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
374  inline const Vector<D, N> operator* (D other) const {
375  Vector<D, N> result = *this;
376  result *= other;
377  return result;
378  }
379 
380  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
381  inline friend const Vector<D, N> operator* (D d, const Vector<D, N> &rhs) {
382  Vector<D, N> result = rhs;
383  result *= d;
384  return result;
385  }
386 
387  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
388  inline const Vector<D, N> operator/ (D other) const {
389  Vector<D, N> result = *this;
390  result *= (1.0 / other);
391  return result;
392  }
393 
394  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
395  inline Vector<D, N>& operator/= (D scale) {
396 #ifdef LINALG_USE_EIGEN
397  auto thisMap = map();
398  thisMap /= scale;
399 #else
400  std::vector<D> result;
401  result.reserve(size());
402 
403  std::transform(m_array.begin(), m_array.end(), std::back_inserter(result),
404  [&](D& entry) {return entry / scale; }
405  );
406 
407  //m_array = std::move(result.data());
408  std::move(result.begin(), result.begin() + result.size(), begin());
409 
410 #endif
411  return *this;
412  }
413 
414  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
415  inline bool operator== (const Vector<D, N> &other) const {
416 #ifdef LINALG_USE_EIGEN
417  return getMap().isApprox(other.getMap());
418 #else
419  unsigned int length = size();
420  if (length != other.size()) return false;
421  bool isEqual = true;
422 
423  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
424  isEqual &= abs(m_array[i] - other[i]) < 1.0e-6;
425  }
426  return isEqual;
427 #endif
428  }
429 
430  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
431  inline bool operator!= (const Vector<D, N> &other) const { return !(*this == other); }
432 
433  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
435  operator QString() const {
436  QString string;
437  string += "vector(";
438  for (auto& e : m_array) {
439  string += QString::number(e);
440  string += ", ";
441  }
442  string.chop(2);
443  string += ")";
444 
445  return string;
446  }
447 
448  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
450  inline operator std::vector<D>() const {
451  std::vector<D> vec(m_array.begin(), m_array.end());
452  return vec;
453  }
454 
455  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
457  friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Vector<D, N>& vec) {
458  os << "vector(";
459  for (auto& e : vec.m_array) {
460  os << e;
461  os << ", ";
462  }
463  os << ")";
464 
465  return os;
466  }

474  inline const D& at(size_t i) const { return m_array.at(i); }
475  inline D& at(size_t i) { return m_array.at(i); }
476 
477  inline const D* data() const {return m_array.data();}
478 
479  inline size_t size() const { return m_array.size(); }
480 
481  typename std::array<D, N>::iterator begin() { return m_array.begin(); }
482  typename std::array<D, N>::iterator end() { return m_array.end(); }
483 
484  typename std::array<D, N>::const_iterator begin() const { return m_array.begin(); }
485  typename std::array<D, N>::const_iterator end() const { return m_array.end(); }

492 
494  QJsonValue asJson(const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) const{
495  QJsonArray array;
496  std::transform(m_array.begin(), m_array.end(), std::back_inserter(array),
497  [](const D& entry) {return double(entry); });
498  return array;
499  }
500 
501  void loadFromJson(const QJsonValue& json) {
502  const QJsonArray& array = json.toArray();
503  for (int i = 0; i < array.size(); i++) {
504  m_array[i] = D(array.at(i).toDouble());
505  }
506  }
507 
509  inline const std::array<D, N>& getArray() const{
510  return m_array;
511  }
512  inline std::array<D, N>& array() {
513  return m_array;
514  }
515 
517  inline std::vector<D> asStdVector() const{
518  return std::vector<D>(m_array.begin(), m_array.end());
519  }
520 
522  inline D x() const {
523  static_assert(N > 0, "N must be greater than zero");
524  return m_array.at(0);
525  }
526  inline void setX(D val) {
527  static_assert(N > 0, "N must be greater than zero");
528  m_array[0] = val;
529  }
530  inline D y() const {
531  static_assert(N > 1, "N must be greater than one");
532  return m_array.at(1);
533  }
534  inline void setY(D val) {
535  static_assert(N > 1, "N must be greater than one");
536  m_array[1] = val;
537  }
538 
539  inline D z() const {
540  static_assert(N > 2, "N must be greater than two");
541  return m_array.at(2);
542  }
543  inline void setZ(D val) {
544  static_assert(N > 2, "N must be greater than two");
545  m_array[2] = val;
546  }
547 
548  inline D w() const {
549  static_assert(N > 3, "N must be greater than three");
550  return m_array.at(3);
551  }
552  inline void setW(D val) {
553  static_assert(N > 3, "N must be greater than three");
554  m_array[3] = val;
555  }
556 
558  typedef std::is_same<D, double> is_double;
559  typedef std::conditional_t<is_double::value, Vector<double, N>&, Vector<double, N>> DoubleVecType;
560  inline const DoubleVecType asDouble() const {
561  if constexpr (is_double::value) {
562  return const_cast<const DoubleVecType>(*this);
563  }
564  else {
565 #ifdef LINALG_USE_EIGEN
566  auto thisMap = getMap();
567  Eigen::Array<double, N, 1> outVec = thisMap.cast<double>();
568  Vector<double, N> result(outVec.data());
569 #else
570  std::vector<double> result(m_array.begin(), m_array.end());
571 #endif
572  return result;
573  }
574  }
575 
578  typedef std::is_same<D, real_g> is_real;
579  typedef std::conditional_t<is_real::value, Vector<real_g, N>&, Vector<real_g, N>> RealVecType;
580  inline const RealVecType asReal() const {
581  if constexpr(is_real::value) {
582  return const_cast<const RealVecType>(*this);
583  }
584  else {
585 #ifdef LINALG_USE_EIGEN
586  auto thisMap = getMap();
587  Eigen::Array<real_g, N, 1> outVec = thisMap.cast<real_g>();
588  Vector<real_g, N> result(outVec.data());
589 #else
590  std::vector<real_g> result(m_array.begin(), m_array.end());
591 #endif
592  return result;
593  }
594  }
595 
597  typedef std::is_same<D, float> is_float;
598  typedef std::conditional_t<is_float::value, Vector<float, N>&, Vector<float, N>> FloatVecType;
599  inline const FloatVecType asFloat() const {
600  if constexpr (is_float::value) {
601  return const_cast<const FloatVecType>(*this);
602  }
603  else {
604 #ifdef LINALG_USE_EIGEN
605  auto thisMap = getMap();
606  Eigen::Array<float, N, 1> outVec = thisMap.cast<float>();
607  Vector<float, N> result(outVec.data());
608 #else
609  std::vector<float> result(m_array.begin(), m_array.end());
610 #endif
611  return result;
612  }
613  }
614 
616  inline Vector<D, N> sortedDescending() {
617  Vector<D, N> sorted = *this;
618  std::sort(sorted.begin(), sorted.end(), std::greater<D>());
619  return sorted;
620  }
621 
623  inline Vector<D, N> normalized() const { return *this / length(); }
624 
626  inline void normalize() { *this = *this / length(); }
627 
629  inline D dot(const Vector<D, N>& other) const {
630 #ifdef LINALG_USE_EIGEN
631  //Eigen::Map<const Eigen::Matrix<D, N, 1>> thisMap = getMatrixMap();
632  //Eigen::Map<const Eigen::Matrix<D, N, 1>> otherMap = other.getMatrixMap();
633  //auto dot = thisMap.dot(otherMap);
634  auto dot = std::inner_product(m_array.begin(), m_array.end(), other.m_array.begin(), D(0));
635  return dot;
636 
637  // Slower
638  //Eigen::Map<const Eigen::Array<D, N, 1>> thisMap2 = getMap();
639  //Eigen::Map<const Eigen::Array<D, N, 1>> otherMap2 = other.getMap();
640  //D res2 = (thisMap2.cwiseProduct(otherMap2)).rowwise().sum()(0);
641  //Q_UNUSED(res2);
642 #else
643  Vector<D, N> product = *this * other;
644  D sum = std::accumulate(product.begin(), product.end(), 0.0);
645  return sum;
646 #endif
647  }
648 
650  inline Vector<D, N> cross(const Vector<D, N>& other) const {
651  static_assert(N == 3, "This function requires a three-element vector");
652 //#ifdef LINALG_USE_EIGEN
653 // Eigen::Map<const Eigen::Matrix<D, N, 1>> thisMap = getMatrixMap();
654 // Eigen::Map<const Eigen::Matrix<D, N, 1>> otherMap = other.getMatrixMap();
655 // Vector<D, N> result(thisMap.cross(otherMap).data());
656 // return result;
657 //#else
658  return Vector<D, N>(
659  m_array.at(1) * other.at(2) - m_array.at(2) * other.at(1),
660  m_array.at(2) * other.at(0) - m_array.at(0) * other.at(2),
661  m_array.at(0) * other.at(1) - m_array.at(1) * other.at(0));
662 //#endif
663  }
664 
666  inline D length() const {
667 #ifdef LINALG_USE_EIGEN
668  Eigen::Map<const Eigen::Matrix<D, N, 1>> thisMap = getMatrixMap();
669  return thisMap.norm();
670 #else
671  Vector<D, N> square = *this * *this;
672  D squareSum = std::accumulate(square.begin(), square.end(), 0.0);
673  return sqrt(squareSum);
674 #endif
675  }
676 
678  inline D lengthSquared() const {
679 #ifdef LINALG_USE_EIGEN
680  Eigen::Map<const Eigen::Matrix<D, N, 1>> thisMap = getMatrixMap();
681  return thisMap.squaredNorm();
682 #else
683  Vector<D, N> square = *this * *this;
684  D squareSum = std::accumulate(square.begin(), square.end(), 0.0);
685  return squareSum;
686 #endif
687  }
688 
690  inline bool hasNegative() { return std::any_of(m_array.begin(), m_array.end(), [](D entry) {return entry < 0; }); }
691 
692 #ifdef LINALG_USE_EIGEN
693  inline Eigen::Map<const Eigen::Array<D, N, 1>> getMap() const {
694  return Eigen::Map<const Eigen::Array<D, N, 1>>(getData());
695  }
696  inline Eigen::Map<const Eigen::Matrix<D, N, 1>> getMatrixMap() const {
697  return Eigen::Map<const Eigen::Matrix<D, N, 1>>(getData());
698  }
699  inline Eigen::Map<Eigen::Array<D, N, 1>> map() {
700  return Eigen::Map<Eigen::Array<D, N, 1>>(data());
701  }
702  inline Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<D, N, 1>> matrixMap() {
703  return Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<D, N, 1>>(data());
704  }
705 #endif
706 
707  inline const D* getData() const {
708  return m_array.data();
709  }
710  inline D* data() {
711  return m_array.data();
712  }
713 
715  Vector<D, N> lerp(const Vector<D, N>& other, double f) {
716  return Interpolation::lerp(*this, other, f);
717  }
718 
720  D distanceSquared(const Vector<D, N>& other) {
721  static_assert(N == 3 || N == 4, "Only vectors of length 3 or four supported");
722  D p1, p2, p3;
723  p1 = m_array[0] - other.m_array[0];
724  p2 = m_array[1] - other.m_array[1];
725  p3 = m_array[2] - other.m_array[2];
726  return p1*p1 + p2*p2 + p3*p3;
727  }
728 
730  D distance(const Vector<D, N>& other) {
731  static_assert(N == 3 || N == 4, "Only vectors of length 3 or four supported");
732  return sqrt(distanceSquared(other));
733  }
734 
736 
737 protected:
742  template<class D, size_t M> friend class Vector;
743 
744  friend class Matrix<D, N, N>;
745  friend class ShaderProgram;

752 
753  explicit Vector(bool fill) {
754  if (fill) {
755  m_array.fill(D(0));
756  }
757  }
758 
759  inline void initialize(D v0, D v1) {
760  m_array[0] = v0;
761  m_array[1] = v1;
762  }
763 
764  inline void initialize(D v0, D v1, D v2) {
765  initialize(v0, v1);
766  if constexpr(N > 2) {
767  m_array[2] = v2;
768  }
769  }
770 
771  inline void initialize(D v0, D v1, D v2, D v3) {
772  initialize(v0, v1, v2);
773  if constexpr (N > 3) {
774  m_array[3] = v3;
775  }
776  }
777 
778  inline void initialize(const std::vector<D>& vec) {
779  //std::move(vec.begin(), vec.begin() + std::min(vec.size(), N), m_array.begin());
780  memcpy(m_array.data(), vec.data(), sizeof(D) * N);
781  }
782 
784 
788  std::array<D, N> m_array;
790 };
791

798 typedef Vector<int, 3> Vector3i;
799 typedef Vector<int, 4> Vector4i;
800 typedef Vector<unsigned int, 2> Vector2u;
801 typedef Vector<unsigned int, 3> Vector3u;
802 typedef Vector<unsigned int, 4> Vector4u;

804 typedef Vector<float, 3> Vector3f;
805 typedef Vector<float, 4> Vector4f;

807 typedef Vector<double, 3> Vector3d;
808 typedef Vector<double, 4> Vector4d;

811 typedef Vector<real_g, 4> Vector4;

816 
818 template <typename T>
819 QJsonValue vectorAsJson(const std::vector<T>& vec) {
820  QJsonArray array;
821  std::copy(vec.begin(), vec.end(), std::back_inserter(array));
822  return array;
823 }
824 
825 template <typename T>
826 std::vector<T> vectorFromJson(const QJsonValue& json) {
827  std::vector<float> vec;
828  const QJsonArray& array = json.toArray();
829  for (int i = 0; i < array.size(); i++) {
830  Vec::EmplaceBack(vec, array.at(i).toDouble());
831  }
832  return vec;
833 }
834 
835 template <typename T, size_t N>
836 QJsonValue vecOfVecAsJson(const std::vector<Vector<T, N>>& vec) {
837  QJsonArray array;
838  for (const auto& v : vec) {
839  array.append(v.asJson());
840  }
841  return array;
842 }
843 
844 template <typename T, size_t N>
845 std::vector<Vector<T, N>> vecOfVecFromJson(const QJsonValue& json) {
846  std::vector<Vector<T, N>> vec;
847  const QJsonArray& array = json.toArray();
848  for (int i = 0; i < array.size(); i++) {
849  Vector<T, N> v;
850  v.loadFromJson(array.at(i));
851  Vec::EmplaceBack(vec, std::move(v));
852  }
853  return vec;
854 }
855 
856 
859 // End namespaces
860 }
